CustomField.formula: IF( OR( TEXT(Status) == 'Aguardando Aprovação Locação', TEXT(Status) == 'Ativo', TEXT(Status) == 'Agendado' ), IF( Data_de_envio_dos_equipamentos__c - TODAY() = 1 || Data_de_envio_dos_equipamentos__c = TODAY(), IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015U4000007jbsF&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1719775998000", "Vermelho", 30, 120), IF( Data_de_envio_dos_equipamentos__c - TODAY() <= 3, IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015U4000007jc6l&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1719776548000", "Laranja", 30, 120), IF( Data_de_envio_dos_equipamentos__c - TODAY() <= 7, IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015U4000007jc3Y&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1719776417000", "Amarelo", 30, 120), IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015U4000007jgdN&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1719776738000", "Verde", 30, 120) ) ) ), '')
CustomField.label: Envio de equipamento
